response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a commodity; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and legacy. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,000,000, but I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional items.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am confident that you will find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or a meaningful investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with someone who will cherish it as much as I have.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
